Name: Word Crack
About the game: Word crack is a simple word guessing game. You have 5 attempts to guess the correct word, with each submission giving you clues and hints about what the word is. CASUAL No timers. No opponents. Just you and some words to crack. Customize the game how you want to play it, and crack words to your heart's content. COMPETITIVE Test your skills against real opponents. See who gets the best score out of 5 words. Guesses are time based... try to not crack under the pressure!
